p: The redox properties of diethylmethylsulfonium bis(trifluoromethylsulfonyl)imide, [S 222][NTf 2], together with different lithium salts were electrochemically characterized by Rangasamy [ 76]. The system [S 222][NTf 2]-LiNTf 2 appears stable in a wide potential range and exhibits a reversible redox behaviour ( Figure 18), which are excellent features to be applied as an electrolyte for practical battery applications.
